item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Well, I think you would just point to the EQII boxes and jello wrestle with Fironia Vie, which seems like a sweet gig if you ask me.
item.content:encoded: Well, I think you would just point to the EQII boxes and jello wrestle with Fironia Vie, which seems like a sweet gig if you ask me.

item.title: By: Teresa Noreen
item.dc:creator: Teresa Noreen
item.description:
LOL...I just imagined Antonia with a beard, that would be too funny ;)
I have to say that I plan to enter the contest and I would have a lot of fun playing Everquest II in real life. It beats the 9-5 job I have right now!
http://www.tnoreen.com/

item.title: By: Finster
item.dc:creator: Finster
item.content:encoded:
Here were some of my favorite parts from the article.

In addition to being the object of desire of every 20th-level dwarf online

Whatever. EVERYONE knows that dwarves like their women bearded.

The winner will receive a one-year modeling contract with SOE, a photo spread in Stuff and additional prizes.

Yeah. It’s degrading… but enough dumb college kids who do nothing but buy EA games will buy it. Sometimes, I hate pop culture.

item.title: By: Factory
item.dc:creator: Factory
item.description: Tacky. I feel degraded even looking at the link.
item.content:encoded: Tacky. I feel degraded even looking at the link.

item.description: SOE is to video games as MTV is to music.
